content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=5.5, y=0.5), offshore pump(position x=-7.5, y=25.5), and multiple pipes connecting them.

### Copper plate factory at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-80.0) 
- Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-82.0) 
- Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-84.0) 

### Stone brick factory at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0)
Consists of furnace(position x=62.0, y=-54.0)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 50} and status EntityStatus.NO_POWER

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing pipe
- Ensure the position where you want to place the pipe is not occupied by water or other entities.
- Make sure to provide a valid position when placing a pipe.

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure the entities you are trying to connect are compatible and can be connected with a pipe.
- Make sure the positions of the entities you are! trying to connect are valid and not occupied by other entities.

### Errors when using Prototype
- Ensure the first argument is a Prototype object when using place_entity function.

### Errors when finding a suitable position
- Ensure there are no existing objects in the way when trying to place an entity at a target location.
